sn26.7:4.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, rūpasañcetanāya uppādo ṭhiti … pe …
sn26.7:4.4: yo dhammasañcetanāya uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn26.7:4.5: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpasañcetanāya nirodho … pe …
sn26.7:4.7: yo dhammasañcetanāya nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
